_source.text: #13 (16) - Sword Art Online - (8.1/10) - Ah, Sword Art Online: brilliant setting, great acting from the main cast... but the main cast definitely needs some better writing to make them more interesting because at the moment this show screams a bit of wasted potential for focusing too much on Kirito meeting cute girls.
